title: Texas Stars Season Opener Tonight: Meet Devin Shore
text:
Texas Stars Season Opener is Saturday: Meet Devin Shore Texas Stars Season Opener is Saturday: Meet Devin Shore Post to Facebook Texas Stars Season Opener is Saturday: Meet Devin Shore Texas Stars Season Opener is Saturday: Meet Devin Shore  //kvue.tv/1LmGA0T   Texas Stars Season Opener is Saturday: Meet Devin Shore Shawn Clynch, KVUE 6:30 p.m. CDT October 9, 2015 
It's season opening night for the Texas Stars in Cedar Park tomorrow (Saturday, October 10th). 1-on-1 with Texas Stars' Devon Shore KVUE 
The AAA affiliate of the National Hockey League's Dallas Stars is hosting San Antonio at 7:00 PM at the Cedar Park Center. 
The Stars are 2-seasons removed from a Calder Cup championship. One guy who plans on leading the Stars to another Calder Cup run is Devin Shore. 
The 2nd round draft selection by the Dallas Stars in 2012 has quite a story. The Canadian is also quickly learning about the rivalry between Texas and Oklahoma. 
Click on the video icon for our 1-on-1 interview with Shore. Read or Share this story: http://kvue.tv/1LmGA0T TOP VIDEOS
